color.div:
Hammerbeaks are avian creatures who inhabit the airspace of the
1st Layer and the
2nd Layer. They usually hunt in small packs and are attracted to shiny things.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details:
Hammerbeaks are simplistic creatures. Their main form of attacking is by bashing into its target with the hard beack infused in their skull. They will also take advantage of prey with severe wounds, even if its weaker.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops:
Hammerbeaks are a great resource for Delvers as most of its parts are useful for descending the Abyss. Their
beaks can be used as flint. Their
feathers are flammable and work as coal and is useful too cook its
meat. :hypers:
